# Saylor Damasceno - Software Engineer & AI Specialist

> Tech Lead with 15+ years of experience in software engineering, specializing in back-end development, AI/LLMs, and cloud architecture.

## Professional Summary

Saylor Damasceno is a Tech Lead and Senior Software Engineer based in Campinas, S찾o Paulo, Brazil. With over 15 years of experience in technology, he has built his career as a specialist in back-end development and software architecture, with a focus on PHP and modern high-performance technologies.

Currently serving as Tech Lead at Consolide, Brazil's largest trademark registration company, he leads engineering teams delivering scalable solutions that combine robustness and innovation.

In recent years, Saylor has expanded into the field of Generative Artificial Intelligence, exploring LLMs, LangChain, RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation), embeddings, and integrations with APIs from OpenAI, Azure, and AWS.
